TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectoryEntries extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry Add (string name, string schemaClassName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry Add(string name, string schemaClassName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the new entry.
The name of the schema that is used for the new entry.
Docs.summary: Creates a new entry in the container.
Docs.returns: A object that represents the new entry.
Docs.exception: An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry Find(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: Contains the name of the child object for which to search.
Docs.summary: Returns the member of this collection with the specified name.
Docs.returns: A that represents the child object that was found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If child objects of different types have the same name, the first matching child object is returned.
> [!NOTE] > The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support this method. Use the overloaded <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Find%2A> method and specify an empty string ("") for the `schemaClassName` parameter. > > If no matching result is found, a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException> with error code 0x2030 is thrown.

Docs.exception: The Active Directory Domain Services object is not a container.
An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry Find (string name, string schemaClassName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry Find(string name, string schemaClassName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the child directory object for which to search.
The class name of the child directory object for which to search.
Docs.summary: Returns the member of this collection with the specified name and of the specified type.
Docs.returns: A object that represents the child object that was found.
Docs.exception: The Active Directory Domain Services object is not a container.
An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry entry) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the object to delete.
Docs.summary: Deletes a member of this collection.
Docs.exception: An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.

Docs.summary: Gets the schemas that specify which child objects are contained in the collection.
Docs.value: A that specifies which child objects are contained in the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.SchemaFilter%2A> property is empty, child objects of all types are visible in the collection; otherwise, only those of the specified types are visible.
